recipe_name: Steamed chicken with creamy leeks and mushrooms
author: James Martin
method: Place a sprig of tarragon on each chicken breast and steam for 10-15 minutes until cooked through. In a pan, sweat the shallots, leeks and mushrooms in the oil together with the curry powder and saffron or turmeric for a few minutes until softened but not brown.  Add the parsley and fromage frais, bring to the boil and simmer gently for a few minutes. Season and serve with the steamed chicken breasts.
ingredients: 4 sprigs tarragon,  4 skinless chicken breasts,  2 shallots,  finely chopped,  1 leek, diced finely ,  200g/7oz chestnut mushrooms, sliced,  2 tbsp olive oil,  pinch curry powder,  pinch saffron strands (steeped in a little water) or turmeric,  small bunch flat leaf parsley, chopped,  100ml/3Â½fl oz low fat fromage frais,  sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
